page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: A631 Mkt.Rasen to Louth road bisects area east to west, over undulating Wolds and with network of minor roads on each side. Heavy daytime traffic _ large lorries moving agricultural produce, fertilisers &c. At weekends up to 100 motor coaches a day pass along A631 taking people from inland industrial areas to coastal resorts of Skegness &c. Two buses each week on Wednesday & Saturday to Georgian town of Louth for shopping _ private bus company receives small subsidy from Lincs CC. National Bus Services avail_ _able at Louth (9 miles). Nearest rail _way at Mkt.Rasen (6 miles). Entry to national Motorway network at Barnetby le Wold, 24 miles, to M180. One Taxi available in Ludford but 36 out of 49 households have car and are on tele_ _phone.
